body: You convert 1 pound of lead into bullets. When you cast this spell, you decide whether you create normal sling bullets, firearm bullets, or firearm pellets. The spell creates two sling bullets, 30 firearm bullets, or 10 uses of pellets.
description: Converts 1 pound of metal into ammunition.

components.text: 1 pound of lead or other soft metal worth 2 gp

component_text: V, S, M (1 pound of lead or other soft metal worth 2 gp)
name: Fabricate Bullets
